Developing SMAL
==================

*SMAL* is open source software and it is free for anyone to use.

We are using git and github to keep track of changes to the code base. The main repository for the code is `here <https://github.com/cni/MRS>`_. To participate in development, please fork this repo and submit pull requests, as explained `on this page <https://help.github.com/articles/using-pull-requests>`_. 

If you are having issues using the code, have discovered a bug that you would like to report, or if you would like to propose new features, please post an issue `on this page <https://github.com/cni/MRS/issues>`_.
